title: Step 45

challengeFiles.name: index
styles

tests.text: Your .cat-right-eye selector should have a position property set to absolute.
Your .cat-right-eye selector should have a top property set to 54px.
Your .cat-right-eye selector should have a left property set to 134px.

description: Move the right eye into position with a position property of absolute a top of 54px, and a left of 134px.
